alert.note: Alert for Gore and Elk Mountains, Central Mountain Valleys (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued March 19 at 3:04PM MDT until March 23 at 12:00AM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH NOW IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH WEDNESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 12 inches possible. Winds could gust as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...In Colorado, Gore and Elk Mountains/Central Mountain Valleys. In Utah, Eastern Uinta Mountains. * WHEN...From Tuesday afternoon through Wednesday evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. A detailed map of the snowfall can be found at: www.weather.gov/gjt/winter.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: Gore and Elk Mountains, Central Mountain Valleys
